page.title: 10SCHOOL PLAYGROUND GAMES-2
page.content: {FRENCH SKIPPING}-You play French skipping with a long piece of elastic. You double the elastic once, then you tie a knot in it. Two people stand inside the elastic and another person jumps. There are three levels, ankles, knees and bummsies. On ankles you are not allowed to stop at all and on knees you have only one stop.But on bummsies you can have as many stops as you like. You jump in and out in different ways. {STUCK IN THE MUD}-This is an exciting game. There is one den and about two people on. The idea of the game is to dodge the people who are on and get back to the den without being caught. If you lose your 5 lives you are on. When caught, you stand arms out- stretched, until someone frees you by going under your arms. You lose one life every time you get caught.
